author: Samsung
description:
This is the official video introducing Bespoke AI Laundry Combo, all-in-one washer-dryer combo.
Looking for a faster, simpler way to wash and dry? or Have you ever worried about leaving laundry in the washer? This innovative appliance delivers seamless wash-to-dry performance in a single machine—no more transferring clothes, no more wasted time. Save space. Save time. Skip the hassle. Now upgraded with voice control and a smarter, more intuitive One UI 7 update. Learn how to save laundry time with seamless wash-to-dry. It's ideal for users who want to fast, hassle-free wash and dry in one go.
Learn more: http://smsng.co/bespoke-home

00:00 Intro
00:06 All-in-One Combo
00:36 Advanced Heat Pump Drying
01:00 Super Speed
01:06 Auto Open Door
01:21 AI Home & On-Device Bixby
02:31 AI Wash & Dry
02:45 Flex Auto Dispense System
02:57 Drum Clean+
03:17 Self Dry

Q: What is a washer-dryer combo?
A: A single front-load machine that can both wash and dry your clothes in one seamless cycle.

Q: Ho
title: Introducing Bespoke AI Laundry Combo | Samsung
